title: Marine Drive at Sunset
snippet: Marine Drive, also known as the Queen’s Necklace, glows beautifully as the sun sets over the Arabian Sea.

title: Hidden Villages of Bandra
snippet: Bandra still hides Portuguese-style villages amidst its bustling streets and posh cafes.

title: Mumbai’s Jazz Era
snippet: In the 1930s, Mumbai was the jazz capital of India with clubs like Venice and Astoria.

title: Art in the Local Trains
snippet: Hidden graffiti and sticker art decorate the compartments of Mumbai’s locals.

title: The Gateway’s Forgotten Architect
snippet: Few know the architect of Gateway of India was Scottish architect George Wittet.

title: Khotachiwadi’s Living History
snippet: This heritage village in South Mumbai preserves a Goan-Portuguese past in wooden homes.
